thread.section_title: Marbles: the Brain Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marbles: the Brain Store | www.marblesthebrainstore.com
thread.title: Robert
thread.title_full: Marbles: the Brain Store reviewed by Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: We don't have a local store in our area, but have visited a couple when we travel. The great part about going to the store is test-driving the products and asking questions/opinions of the personnel. Since it isn't always convenient to travel to the store, we purchased some games online and have really enjoyed them as a family. Keep up the great work!
